message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $200. I believe it offers exceptional value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $150?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints but $200 is my bottom line. I'm confident you won't find this product at a better price.
